subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The leader board at Torrey Pines was top heavy with players who teed off on the North Course, which at last year’s event played to an average that was 2.8 strokes easier than the South layout.
snippet: The leader board at Torrey Pines was top heavy with players who teed off on the North Course, which at last year’s event played to an average that was 2.8 strokes easier than the South layout.
